job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As Front-End Engineer, your main goal is to develop innovative apps for our initiatives and for our business lines with the focus on Vue.js 3 and GenAI. You help realize the execution of the Innovation Tech mission: the high-speed engine that delivers the future of banking! Your activities include:
     * Create visually appealing and highly interactive user interfaces using modern web technologies and frameworks.
     * Ensure that end-users have a seamless and engaging experience by translating design concepts into responsive and intuitive web applications.
     * Collaborate closely with Product Designers, Back-end Engineers, and other team members to bring design concepts to life.
     * Troubleshoot and solve complex technical issues to maintain the reliability and performance of web applications
     * Take ownership of specific features, tasks, or even entire projects, seeing them through from conception to completion and successful release.
     * Write clean and efficient code, adhering to best practices, and ensuring that your solutions are reusable and maintainable.

Working environment

   We have a start-up vibe. The Innovation Engineering team consists of more than 25 professionals with a passion for innovation and development and we work every day to create (measurable) impact for the bank. We focus on 'making a difference' and take a pragmatic approach to our solutions. You'll work intensively together with our innovation initiatives, business teams and you'll be part of a self-organized, multi-disciplinary, Agile team. We bring in knowledge from other departments within the bank such as product experts, legal and information security when necessary. There is an open team atmosphere where initiative is encouraged and where coaching and knowledge transfer is part of your day to day job.
job_details.full_text:
Front-end Developer GenAI

As Front-End Engineer, your main goal is to develop innovative apps for our initiatives and for our business lines with the focus on Vue.js 3 and GenAI. You help realize the execution of the Innovation Tech mission: the high-speed engine that delivers the future of banking! Your activities include:
     * Create visually appealing and highly interactive user interfaces using modern web technologies and frameworks.
     * Ensure that end-users have a seamless and engaging experience by translating design concepts into responsive and intuitive web applications.
     * Collaborate closely with Product Designers, Back-end Engineers, and other team members to bring design concepts to life.
     * Troubleshoot and solve complex technical issues to maintain the reliability and performance of web applications
     * Take ownership of specific features, tasks, or even entire projects, seeing them through from conception to completion and successful release.
     * Write clean and efficient code, adhering to best practices, and ensuring that your solutions are reusable and maintainable.

Working environment

   We have a start-up vibe. The Innovation Engineering team consists of more than 25 professionals with a passion for innovation and development and we work every day to create (measurable) impact for the bank. We focus on 'making a difference' and take a pragmatic approach to our solutions. You'll work intensively together with our innovation initiatives, business teams and you'll be part of a self-organized, multi-disciplinary, Agile team. We bring in knowledge from other departments within the bank such as product experts, legal and information security when necessary. There is an open team atmosphere where initiative is encouraged and where coaching and knowledge transfer is part of your day to day job.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end development using Vue.js and general web technologies, with only a mention of GenAI as a focus area. It lacks the core responsibilities and technologies associated with either an ML Engineer or a GenAI Engineer, such as model development, fine-tuning, or MLOps.

phrases: develop innovative apps for our initiatives and for our business lines with the focus on Vue.js 3 and GenAI
Create visually appealing and highly interactive user interfaces using modern web technologies and frameworks
Ensure that end-users have a seamless and engaging experience by translating design concepts into responsive and intuitive web applications
Troubleshoot and solve complex technical issues to maintain the reliability and performance of web applications
Write clean and efficient code, adhering to best practices, and ensuring that your solutions are reusable and maintainable
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of building user-facing applications, including UI development, ensuring user experience, troubleshooting, and writing maintainable code, which are all hallmarks of software development.

phrases: develop innovative apps for our initiatives and for our business lines
help realize the execution of the Innovation Tech mission: the high-speed engine that delivers the future of banking!
work intensively together with our innovation initiatives, business teams
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of business goals, innovation initiatives, and collaboration with business teams to deliver value.

phrases: seeing them through from conception to completion and successful release
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, 'successful release' implies involvement in the deployment and operational aspects of software, which can be a tangential overlap.

phrases: Collaborate closely with Product Designers, Back-end Engineers, and other team members
you'll work intensively together with our innovation initiatives, business teams
you'll be part of a self-organized, multi-disciplinary, Agile team
There is an open team atmosphere where initiative is encouraged and where coaching and knowledge transfer is part of your day to day job
We bring in knowledge from other departments within the bank such as product experts, legal and information security when necessary
soft_skills.justification: These phrases highlight collaboration with various teams, multidisciplinary work, knowledge sharing, and interaction with different departments.

phrases: Troubleshoot and solve complex technical issues
We focus on 'making a difference' and take a pragmatic approach to our solutions
soft_skills.justification: These phrases directly mention troubleshooting complex issues and adopting a pragmatic approach to solutions.

phrases: develop innovative apps
Take ownership of specific features, tasks, or even entire projects, seeing them through from conception to completion and successful release
initiative is encouraged
soft_skills.justification: These phrases emphasize developing innovative applications, taking ownership of projects, and encouraging initiative.

phrases: coaching and knowledge transfer is part of your day to day job
soft_skills.justification: The mention of knowledge transfer implies a continuous learning environment.
